Parents are to keep the way of the Lord. Every other way is forbidden. Parents and children, "make straight paths for your feet, lest that which is lame be turned out of the way". There must be no laxness in the principles governing the family. The fear of God reigning in the home will bring the softening, subduing influence of the angels, and the hearts of parents and children will be filled with holy joy. The children are not to be allowed to be cross and refractory, for this is dishonoring to God. 


                                     -87-
